channel.title: Need help running my client in vista (youtube video and pictures included)
channel.description:
Ok so i downloaded a client to play flamescape found at flamescape.biz
When i run it i get the following error.
VIDEO: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8aaS-661Ro4
Pics: What i have in my run.bat for my client. [IMG]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x281/victor123654/run.jpg[/img] The error i get. [IMG]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x281/victor123654/Untitled-2.jpg[/img] My version of java [IMG]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x281/victor123654/java.jpg[/img]
If there is anything else needed please post and ask.

item.title: Need help running my client in vista (youtube video and pictures included)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[code][quote=“Beastly¿, post:3, topic:292354”]This is the 3rd time you posted this? And didn’t you fix it?

Moderator please lock or do something about this.[/quote]
Or someone help him? This is not even a run command lol, this is a 50% compile command. This was setup by a noob i can tell. Replace yours with this.

@echo off
title Running *place server name here* Client....
echo Thanks for choosing *place server name here*. I hope you enjoy playing.
java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
pause

NOTE - This is one from the top of my head, but it has a 90% chance of working. If it does not work PM me and i will grab 1 of the 3 forms i have that work to run a client.
[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help running my client in vista (youtube video and pictures included)

item.title: Need help running my client in vista (youtube video and pictures included)
item.dc:creator: @Hextion Hextion
item.description:
@Hextion wrote:

Your using Java SRE and JRE right?

JDK Is not to run the client, JDK is used for compiling Java files.
